import { React, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import styled from "styled-components" import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" const ActionDetails = () => { const { pathname } = useLocation() useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, [pathname]) const [showImg, setImg] = useState(null) const [showName, setName] = useState(null) var { action } = useParams() useEffect(() => { const getData = async () => { await fetch('http://localhost:3002/post-action', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({action: action}) }) const response = await fetch('http://localhost:3002/action-details') const output = await response.json() setName(output.subHeader.name) setImg(output.subHeader.src) } getData() }, []) return( <>
Home / Ações / {action}

{action}

{showName}

COTAÇÃO

R$ 13,57

VARIAÇÃO (12M)

R$ 13,57

P/L

R$ 13,57

R$ 13,57

 ) } const SubHeader = styled.div` background-color: #173e5b; padding: 0px 18% 0px 18%; ` const DivImg = styled.div` border-radius: 10px; height: 100px; width: 100px; padding: 10px; background-color: white; ` const Home = styled.span` color:rgb(165, 170, 177); cursor: pointer; &:hover{ transition: 0.2s ease-in-out; color: white; } ` const Indicators = styled.div` padding: 40px 18% 40px 18%; background-color: #101318; ` const Card = styled.div` display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; background-color: #32384d; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 50px 10px 50px; ` const FundamentalIndicators = styled.div` background-color: #32384d; border-radius: 10px; padding: 25px 30px 25px 30px; margin-top: 50px; ` const P = styled.div` margin: 0; ` export default ActionDetails
